content: during a recent trip to hobby lobby in my current quest to branch out and add more colored yarns to my patterns i came across yarn bee dazzling yarn most of the color options didn t do much for me but a skein of morning haze practically jumped off the shelf and into my cart you ve had that happen before too right it is soooo pretty the steely purple blue and gray color changes are long and subtle just how i like them and a continuous metallic thread gives the yarn such a pretty reflective finish it is definitely on the lighter side of the #4 worsted category comparable to the feel of caron simply soft or bernat satin when i first started playing with it i was afraid that my 3rd loop stitches would get completely lost in the busyness of the yarn and while they certainly don t jump off the scarf one of the things i love about the finished product is the understated texture that is magnified when the light hits it in a certain way of course this pattern would be beautiful in a solid-colored yarn as well and i may try that next
